tr.td:
某某集团中小企业尽职调查报告
（非标版）
业务简要介绍（推介或说明要点：一句话）

div.span: 1、客户简介：
2、在保明细：

table.tbody:
<#assign duiwaiDanbao_amount_total=0 />
												<#if corpDuiwaiDanbao?exists>
												<#list corpDuiwaiDanbao as duiwaiDanbao>
												

													${duiwaiDanbao.loanBranch!}
													${duiwaiDanbao.amount!}<#assign duiwaiDanbao_amount_total=duiwaiDanbao_amount_total+duiwaiDanbao.amount/>
													${duiwaiDanbao.startDate!} - ${duiwaiDanbao.endDate!}
													
													${duiwaiDanbao.descInfo!}
												
												</#list>
												</#if>
												

													合计
													${duiwaiDanbao_amount_total!}

div.span: 3、保后数据：

table.tbody:
<#assign ownershipStruct_capital_total=0 ownershipStruct_capitalPropor_total=0 />
												<#if ownershipStructs?exists>
												<#list ownershipStructs as ownershipStruct>
												

													${ownershipStruct_index+1}
													${ownershipStruct.shareholder!}
													${ownershipStruct.capital!}<#assign ownershipStruct_capital_total=ownershipStruct_capital_total+ownershipStruct.capital/>
													${ownershipStruct.capitalPropor!}<#assign ownershipStruct_capitalPropor_total=ownershipStruct_capitalPropor_total+ownershipStruct.capitalPropor/>
													${ownershipStruct.contriForm!}
												
												</#list>
												</#if>
												

													合计
													
													${ownershipStruct_capital_total}
													${ownershipStruct_capitalPropor_total}

${mainBankAcc.inflow!} <#if (mainBankAcc.inflow??) > <#assign mainBankAcc_inflow=mainBankAcc_inflow+(mainBankAcc.inflow) /> </#if>
${mainBankAcc.outflow!} <#if (mainBankAcc.outflow??) > <#assign mainBankAcc_outflow=mainBankAcc_outflow+(mainBankAcc.outflow) /> </#if>

</#list> </#if>

div.h4: 十、主要风险与控制措施：

div.span: 结论：对本项目的明确态度：
